title: Website scraping and eBay listing
job_overview:
We are looking for a detail-oriented and experienced Web Scraping & eBay Listing Specialist to assist with extracting data from various websites and creating professional eBay listings. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of web scraping tools and techniques, as well as experience with eBay's listing procedures.

Responsibilities:

Develop and execute web scraping scripts to collect product data from target websites

Clean and organize the scraped data for listing purposes

Create and upload eBay listings with accurate product information, images, and pricing

Optimize listings for better visibility and sales

Ensure compliance with eBay policies and web scraping best practices

Requirements:

Proven experience with web scraping tools (e.g., Python, BeautifulSoup, Selenium)

Familiarity with eBay listing process and policies

Strong attention to detail and organizational skills

Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

Good communication skills
